name: Back To The World (CAGD)
description:
Back to the World is a fast paced 3D sci-fi racing game where you travel through unexplored planets. Prepare yourself for some of the most wild rides you’ll ever experience. Show mankind what lies in these undiscovered worlds. Be as quick as possible though because everyone is anticipating your findings! 

Get into your spaceship and prepare to travel through the universe as fast as possible. Avoid the obstacles blocking your path in each of these lands. Customize your ship and don’t forget to collect any canisters you see lying around. Keep moving forward with your Back To The World!

Credits

Payton Fuller - Project Manager/Modeler

Joshua Herrera - Programmer 

Trevor Craigo - Level Designer 

Ryan Inthavong - Level Designer

System Requirements 

CPU: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent 

RAM: 8 GB OS: Windows 10 or later 

Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950 

Free Disk Space: 1.5GB 

Dedicated Video RAM: 2048 MB 

Installation Instructions:

1. Press download on the game’s itch.io page. 

2. Locate the downloaded .zip folder. 

3. Extract the downloaded .zip folder to the preferred location. 

4. Open the BackToTheWorldSCM.exe file to start the game.
